role.name: Editor
role.description: Person responsible for the content of an article and all associated content
role.comment: This person must ensure all content is ready for publication, including conformity with standards. The editor must also ensure that the content is relevant and up-to-date

role.name: Author
role.description: Person who originated the content but not necessarily entered it into this application
role.comment: This person is an alternate point of contact for the material

role.name: Approver
role.description: Person responsible for approving or rejecting a content request

role.name: Initiator
role.description: Person requesting the addition, modification or deletion of a piece of content

role.name: Subscriber
role.description: Person requesting a notification to be sent each time a piece of content is updated

role.name: Content Remover
role.description: Person who can remove content

role.name: Administrator
role.description: Supports this site by ensuring its proper configuration, backup and execution
role.comment: An administrator is in charge of various technical aspects of this site support. It includes monitoring and tuning the performance, backing up and restoring files, administrating the underlying database, installing and configuring the servers, installing and configuring this site software and controlling the version of this site

role.name: Email From
role.description: Sender of an email

role.name: Email To
role.description: Recipient of an email

role.name: Email Cc
role.description: Carbon copy recipient of an email

role.name: Email Bcc
role.description: Blind carbon copy recipient of an email

role.name: Proxy Grantor
role.description: User granting its transaction privileges to another user

role.name: Proxy Grantee
role.description: User receiving transaction privileges from another user

role.name: Direct Manager
role.description: User managing another person

role.name: Account General Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the edition of accounts, but not the creation of accounts

role.name: Company LDAP control
role.description: Role associating a company with a LDAP control

role.name: City LDAP control
role.description: Role associating a city with a LDAP control

role.name: State LDAP control
role.description: Role associating a state with a LDAP control

role.name: Country LDAP control
role.description: Role associating a country with a LDAP control

role.name: Default LDAP control
role.description: Role associating a building, a company, a city, a state or a country with a LDAP control

role.name: Account Template
role.description: Role indicating that a user account is a template account

role.name: Active Directory Administration Recipient
role.description: Role indicating that a user is the recipient of all emails notifying of a data update in Active Directory

role.name: Active Directory Room Administrator
role.description: Role indicating that a user can update room numbers

role.name: Account Photo Watermark Template
role.description: Role indicating that a file is the watermark template for all photos

role.name: Administrative Proxy
role.description: Role indicating that a user can use the administrative proxy feature

role.name: Department Manager
role.description: Role indicating that a user is the direct manager of another user

role.name: Departments Administrator
role.description: Role indicating that a user can manage the list of departments

role.name: Buildings Administrator
role.description: Role indicating that a user can manage the list of buildings

role.name: Companies Administrator
role.description: Role indicating that a user can manage the list of companies

role.name: Account Super Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the complete edition of accounts, including the creation of accounts

role.name: Account Exporter
role.description: Role allowing the export of all account data

role.name: Account Limited Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the limited edition of accounts, not including the creation of accounts

role.name: Account Employee Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the edition of account confidential data, such as employee data

role.name: Account Team Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the edition of account team data

role.name: Feedback Administrator
role.description: Role of the recipient of feedbacks

role.name: Access Outside Domain
role.description: Role of the users that are granted access to this application while being out of the required domain. Active Directory groups cannot be used for this role

role.name: Contact Template
role.description: Role indicating that a user account is a contact template

role.name: Account Administration Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the edition of account administration data

role.name: Contact Super Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the complete edition of contacts, including the creation of contacts

role.name: Account Name Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the complete edition of account names

role.name: Contact Name Administrator
role.description: Role allowing the complete edition of contact names

role.name: Termination LDAP Control
role.description: Role indicating in which LDAP control each terminated user account should be moved to

role.name: Account Access Denied
role.description: Role indicating a user that is denied access to this application

role.name: Account Creator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can create new accounts

role.name: Account Access Allowed
role.description: Role indicating a user that is granted access to this application

role.name: Owner
role.description: Owner of a group
role.comment: The group owner is responsible for ensuring that the memberships are accurate and up-to-date

role.name: Member
role.description: Member of a group, as assigned by the group owner

role.name: Group General Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can edit groups, including adding and removing members

role.name: Group Super Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can create, edit and remove groups as well as including adding and removing members

role.name: Group Limited Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can add and remove members

role.name: Group Exporter
role.description: Role indicating a user that can export group data

role.name: Group Template
role.description: Role indicating a group template

role.name: Group Name Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can edit a group name

role.name: Group Creator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can create groups

role.name: Primary Account Results
role.description: Role indicating a user that is part of the primary account results when searching for accounts

role.name: Account No Password Reminder
role.description: Role indicating a user that should not receive password expiration reminders

role.name: Warning Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can edit warnings

role.name: Email Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can edit emails

role.name: System Account Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can add and remove system accounts

role.name: System Group Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can add and remove system groups

role.name: Entry Log Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can view entry logs

role.name: Error Log Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can view error logs

role.name: Response Log Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can view response logs

role.name: Data Source Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can view data sources

role.name: File Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can view files

role.name: LDAP Control Administrator
role.description: Role indicating a user that can add and remove system LDAP controls
